channel.title: Blogs on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Portfolio

item.title: First Post and Some Python!
item.description: Hey everyone! Hope yall are doing well! Here’s a picture of a painting I managed to complete during this COVID-19 quarantine. I’m not an art person at all, so I’m really proud of myself! Reticulate lets R and Python play together, so let’s pull up the package in R code chunk. Then assign “Never thought” and save it as one. library(reticulate) ## Warning: package 'reticulate' was built under R version 3.
